channel.title: How do I make shops? Need detailed helped
channel.description:
Alright, here's what I'm specifically asking for:
I want to make an NPC, K? How do I do that? Then, I want to make a shop with that NPC. How do I do that? Please be specific. I'm using the fr33s4p3 server source, if it helps. Thanks.
